abstract.para: This book provides a guide to working with XML data using C++ and the xmlwrapp library. It covers everything that will need to know to get started working with xmlwrapp. After reading this book, you should not have any trouble reading the xmlwrapp header files or using the xmlwrapp reference documents.
The latest version of this book can be found at http://pmade.org/software/xmlwrapp/.
